meanings.definition: A wartlike growth on the skin or mucous membrane, typically in the genital area, caused by a virus.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with condylomas after examining the growth on their skin.
meanings.sent2: Condylomas can be painful and require medical treatment to remove them.
meanings.sent3: The condylomas on the skin looked like tiny bumps playing hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was overrun with condylomas, spreading like wildfire among the flowers.
meanings.sent5: The condylomas on the skin resembled small, stubborn invaders refusing to leave.
